title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Virtual Collaborative Learning Design for Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners design collaborative tasks based on science education scenarios using narrative inquiry methods.
Learners implement virtual collaborative learning environments based on situated learning theory using LMS-based tools.

Learners upload mobile-accessible project deliverables (app prototype/demo video) to GitHub or Figma, collect ≥5 specific feedback items from ≥3 peers, and document ≥2 iterative improvements based on feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
